mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeboard (bno, title, writer, content) VALUES(noticeboard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from noticeboard where title like concat('%', #{searchName}, '%') where writer like concat('%', #{searchName}, '%') where content like concat('%', #{searchName}, '%') where title like 'concat('%', #{searchName}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{searchName}, '%') where 1 = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE noticeboard SET writer = #{writer}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updatedate = sysdate WHERE bno = #{bno}
